name: Windaug 1.1
description:
This version of Windaug is incomplete and does not reflect the quality of the final version.

This version of Windaug features:

- Only Windowed Tabs

- Windaug Paint, featuring 6 colours.

- Chromis, our easy to use browser

- Daugzone, our social media platform

- Jimbo, the Windaug Virtual Assistant

And a killer bootup sequence.

This is nowhere near the amount of content that will be available in the full release.
